entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's pet rat who escapes from the shop and takes refuge under a wastepaper bin.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is a huge and orange cat that attacks Scabbers.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the owner of Scabbers who gets attacked by Crookshanks.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is Ron's friend who follows him to catch Scabbers.

entities.name: quality quidditch supplies
entities.description: Quality Quidditch Supplies is a shop where Ron and Harry go to buy things related to Quidditch.

relationships.description: Harry helps Ron to catch Scabbers.
Ron visits Quality Quidditch Supplies with Harry.
